name: CrunchyTechpoweredbynewsapiorg
0:
”Alexa ask crunchy tech to give latest news”
”Alexa ask crunchy tech to give latest news from tech radar”
”Alexa ask crunchy tech to give top news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crunchy tech
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is an awesome skill for tech enthusiasts. It will read out top and latest tech news.

To ask random latest news - "Alexa ask crunchy tech to give latest news" to get latest tech news.
To ask random tech news - "Alexa ask crunchy tech to give top news" to get top tech news.
You can also specify sources like - ""Alexa ask crunchy tech to give top news from recode"
Currently supported sources are - 
recode
the next web
tech crunch
tech radar

Please provide your valuable feedback and comments.
More features request is appreciated :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
